name: LINK - line puzzle game
description:
LINK: the line puzzle game is a brain training puzzle game that activates your brain while you play.
Why not try activating your brain during your free time on your commute or before bed?

How to play
There's only one rule:
Connect all the dots that share a color.
You can start anywhere.

Some of these line puzzles are complex and difficult.
When you reach them, try making use of the hints.

Stages
We've prepared 8 levels with a total of more than 400 individual stages.
It starts out with simple, easy stages, but every time you go up a level the number of colors goes up, and it gets more and more complex.
It might seem too easy at first.
However, it's important that you clear the easy stages too.
The hints you'll need to clear the later complicated stages are all scattered throughout the easy stages.

Some stages contain rectangles and other unusual shapes.
Stages with multiple colors and special shapes will stimulate your imagination.

Take this chance to activate your brain while you play! Challenge yourself with this free brain training puzzle game.
You'll be hooked in no time.
